title.rendered: “Inside the IDF’s Strategic Offensive: Elimination of Terrorist Cells and Infrastructure in Gaza Strip”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Structures from which fire was directed at our forces in the northern Gaza Strip were attacked and fire was circled on terrorist cells that threatened our forces in the central Strip; IDF activity continues in the space around the Shiffa’ hospital.

IDF forces and the Shin Bet continue the focused fighting in the area of the Shiffa’ Hospital in the northern Gaza Strip. Combat teams from the 401th Brigade, the Nahal Brigade and the Shayetet 13 under the 162th Division are engaged in battles in the area, while avoiding harm to civilians, patients and medical teams. During the recent day, the fighters eliminated terrorists at close range who entrenched themselves in the area and found weapons in the hospital area.

As part of the 215th Fire Brigade activity in the northern Gaza Strip, Air Force aircraft attacked several buildings in the Rimal neighborhood, from which rockets were fired yesterday, and attempted sniping at IDF forces took place. During the attacks, one of the terrorists who fired the rockets was killed.

As part of the activity of the Nahal Brigade combat team in the central Strip, the fighters eliminated more than 15 terrorists throughout the last day. In one of the forces’ activities, the Brigade’s fire complex identified a terrorist cell emerging from a tunnel opening and moving towards a military structure near the forces, and a fighter plane attacked and eliminated it. In another activity, two snipers from the combat team identified and eliminated with precise fire, a terrorist cell moving close to the forces in the area.

Over the course of the last day, the Air Force attacked about 80 targets across the Gaza Strip.
Among the targets attacked were military buildings and additional military infrastructures in the Strip.

The forces of the 98th Division continue to operate in the southern Gaza Strip.
The combat team of the 7th Brigade and Air Force forces eliminated terrorists in the area and a number of terrorist infrastructures were destroyed by engineering forces. The combat team of the Commando Brigade continues to operate in the al-Amar area, and together with the Air Force eliminated terrorists and destroyed terrorist infrastructures from which fire was directed at the forces.
In another activity in the area, the combat team of the Givati Brigade eliminated with sniper fire and shells about 15 terrorists in the last day. This goes along with weapons which were found by the forces in the area, including grenades, weapons and military equipment.

Attached is documentation of IDF attacks in the Strip: https://bit.ly/3TCJNS9

Attached is documentation of IDF forces activity in the Strip: https://bit.ly/3vFaZrq

Attached are photos from the IDF forces activity in the strip: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC31032024894287942
